channel.title: Why do you wake up each day?
channel.description:
[center][size=15pt]Why do you wake up each day?[/size][/center]
This is a pretty interesting video about finding something to get you to want to wake up in the morning. I suggest you watch it. It's really good, and may help some of you. And if you don't think you need any help. Just watch the video. It's still entertaining. :P http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UmAfQ-GgtCQ
If you are wondering if anyone responded to the video. [url=http://www.youtube.com/results?search_type=search_videos&search_query=why%20do%20you%20wake%20up%20each%20day&search_sort=&search_category=0&page=1]Check this out[/url].
If you don't need any help and don't like this guy. Watch this after you watch the first movie. By the way, the guy who made the video right below this sentence, is pretty crazy lol. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CHmkcUoXynM
So why do you wake up in the morning? I wake up to see what's new with other people's lives, I wake up to work out, I wake up to see my beautiful cousins faces, I wake up to hang out with my friends, and I just wake up to feel alive. So besides school and seeing your parent's, why do you guys wake up?
~Ron

item.title: Why do you wake up each day?
item.dc:creator: @S_ms S!ms
item.description:
@S_ms wrote:

Okay, seriously, I don’t really have something nice this year. It’s only fun with my friends, but i’m in a class with only 6 ugly girls, so yea, life sucks at the moment

item.title: Why do you wake up each day?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

I read all the responses and a lot of them were very nice (the ones that weren’t were the jokes. C’mon we’re being serious here). That guy was right though. Every time you do get up or wake up, you should have something there for you. Otherwise life would be very dull.

[quote=“frank_, post:22, topic:24769”]Because i cannot possibly sleep any more.

a more apt question would have been, why do you get up each day[/quote]
Yep, but I went by what question he asked on his video.

~Ron

Read full topic

item.title: Why do you wake up each day?
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

i wake up because my alarm clock rings VERY loud in my ear at 6 o’clock every weekday morning lol. but ill watch those videos because the more i seriously think about this idea, the more interesting it becomes. because what really makes us wake up every morning.(besides a loud noise or our parents yelling at us to get ready 4 school). maybe its just because our bodies have had enough rest and have “refilled”. but what truly stops us from just sleeping forever?

Read full topic
